Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

listNewItems(uint256[],uint256[],uint256.details: Sets the max supply for multiple items.

params.prices: An array of corresponding prices for the items.
params.supply: An array of corresponding prices for the items.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.itemIds: The list of item IDs to purchase.

params.deadline: The deadline timestamp for the permit signature.
params.holder: The NFTL holder granting spend approval.
params.itemIds: The list of item IDs to purchase.

params.deadline: The deadline timestamp for the permit signature.
params.itemIds: The list of item IDs to purchase.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setItemsAvailability(uint256[],bool[]).details: Sets the availability for multiple items.

params.availability: An array of corresponding booleans for each item's availability.

setItemsMaxSupply(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Sets the max supply for multiple items.

params.supply: An array of corresponding prices for the items.

setItemsPrice(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Sets the prices for multiple items.

params.prices: An array of corresponding prices for the items.

splitSignature(bytes).details: Splits a signature into its components (v, r, s).

returns._0: Signature The signature struct with split components.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

listNewItems(uint256[],uint256[],uint256.notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.The length of `itemIds` and `supply` arrays must be the same.

purchaseItems(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Purchase item(s) for NFTL provided prior NFTL spend approval.

purchaseItemsForWithPermit(address,uint2.notice: Purchase item(s) on behalf of NFTL holder using permit.

purchaseItemsWithPermit(uint256[],uint25.notice: Purchase item(s) for NFTL without prior NFTL spend approval using permit.

setItemsAvailability(uint256[],bool[]).notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.The length of `itemIds` and `availability` arrays must be the same.

setItemsMaxSupply(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.The length of `itemIds` and `supply` arrays must be the same.

setItemsPrice(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.The length of `itemIds` and `prices` arrays must be the same.
